greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Rectangular array T(n,k) read by antidiagonals; generating function of column n is 1/F(n,x), where F(n,x) is the polynomial 1 - x - x^2 - 2*x^3 -...- F(n+1)*x^n and F(n+1) is the (n+1)st Fibonacci number, for n=0,1,2,...
comment: Transpose of the array in A096669.
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_, Jul 03 2004
